links.*: Of Tuor and his Coming to Gondolin

wikitext.*:
'''''Anar kaluva tielyanna!''''' is a [[Quenya]] farewell given by [[Gelmir (messenger of Círdan)|Gelmir]] to [[Tuor]] when they encountered each other in [[Annon-in-Gelydh]].<ref>{{UT|1}}, p. 22</ref> It translates as "The sun shall shine upon your path".<ref>{{UT|1a}}, p. 51, note 3</ref>

* ''[[Anar]]''
* ''[[cal-]]''
* ''[[tië]]''
*''[[-lya]]''
*''[[-nna]]''
